desc_content.paragraph: Handle area action zones for mouse actions/gestures
Cancel animation, returning to the original frame

field_body.paragraph: restore_frame (boolean, (optional)) – Restore Frame, Restore the frame when animation was initialized

desc_content.paragraph: Play animation

list_item.paragraph: reverse (boolean, (optional)) – Play in Reverse, Animation is played backwards
sync (boolean, (optional)) – Sync, Drop frames to maintain framerate

desc_content.paragraph: Step through animation by position
Duplicate selected area into new window
Join selected areas into new window
Move selected area edges
Operations for splitting and merging
Split selected area into new windows

list_item.paragraph: cursor (int array of 2 items in [-inf, inf], (optional)) – Cursor

desc_content.paragraph: Swap selected areas screen positions
Revert back to the original screen layout, before fullscreen area overlay
Delete active screen
Show drivers editor in a separate window
Jump to first/last frame in frame range

field_body.paragraph: end (boolean, (optional)) – Last Frame, Jump to the last frame of the frame range

desc_content.paragraph: Move current frame forward/backward by a given number
Toggle header display
Display header region context menu
Expand or collapse the header pulldown menus
Jump to previous/next keyframe
Jump to previous/next marker
Add a new screen
Display menu for last action performed
Blend in and out overlapping region
Toggle the region’s alignment (left/right or top/bottom)
Split selected area into camera, front, right & top views
Scale selected area
Display menu for previous actions performed
Repeat last action
Toggle display selected area as fullscreen/maximized

field_body.paragraph: use_hide_panels (boolean, (optional)) – Hide Panels, Hide all the panels

desc_content.paragraph: Cycle through available screens
Capture a picture of the active area or whole Blender window

list_item.paragraph: filepath (string, (optional, never None)) – File Path, Path to file
check_existing (boolean, (optional)) – Check Existing, Check and warn on overwriting existing files
filemode (int in [1, 9], (optional)) – File Browser Mode, The setting for the file browser mode to load a .blend file, a library or a special file

display_type (enum in ['DEFAULT', 'LIST_SHORT', 'LIST_LONG', 'THUMBNAIL'], (optional)) – Display TypeDEFAULT Default, Automatically determine display type for files.LIST_SHORT Short List, Display files as short list.LIST_LONG Long List, Display files as a detailed list.THUMBNAIL Thumbnails, Display files as thumbnails.

sort_method (enum in ['FILE_SORT_ALPHA', 'FILE_SORT_EXTENSION', 'FILE_SORT_TIME', 'FILE_SORT_SIZE'], (optional)) – File sorting modeFILE_SORT_ALPHA Sort alphabetically, Sort the file list alphabetically.FILE_SORT_EXTENSION Sort by extension, Sort the file list by extension/type.FILE_SORT_TIME Sort by time, Sort files by modification time.FILE_SORT_SIZE Sort by size, Sort files by size.
full (boolean, (optional)) – Full Screen, Capture the whole window (otherwise only capture the active area)

desc_content.paragraph: Cycle through the editor context by activating the next/previous one

field_body.paragraph: direction (enum in ['PREV', 'NEXT'], (optional)) – Direction, Direction to cycle through

desc_content.paragraph: Remove unused settings for invisible editors
Show user preferences
Cycle through workspaces

field_body.paragraph: direction (enum in ['PREV', 'NEXT'], (optional)) – Direction, Direction to cycle through
